${modID}:PowerID.NAME: Ultimate Power
DESCRIPTIONS: You are Very Cool and Strong.

${modID}:MysophobiaPower.NAME: 洁癖
DESCRIPTIONS: 每回合开始时， 失去 #b

${modID}:ConservationPower.NAME: 生命守恒
DESCRIPTIONS: 额外回复造成的未被格挡的伤害 20% 的生命

${modID}:Fullstate.NAME: 完全体
DESCRIPTIONS: 回复等量造成的未被格挡的伤害

${modID}:FamiliarPower.NAME: 熟悉
DESCRIPTIONS: 获得 #b 10 层 #y 熟悉 时，进入 #y 完全体

${modID}:Prey mark.NAME: 猎物印记
DESCRIPTIONS: 被标记的敌人在被攻击时，将给予你等量生命值回复

${modID}:BurnoutPower.NAME: 燃尽
DESCRIPTIONS: 每次失去2生命, 获得 #g

${modID}:HealByHandPower.NAME: 以手取之
DESCRIPTIONS: 每当受到攻击时，回复玩家 #g

${modID}:BloodPactPower.NAME: 血契
DESCRIPTIONS: 每当你失去生命， 抽 #y

${modID}:SelectPower.NAME: 选择
DESCRIPTIONS: 每回合第一次消耗牌时，获得 [E]

${modID}:BloodShelterPower.NAME: 血之加护
DESCRIPTIONS: 每当你失去生命， 获得 #y

${modID}:CookPower.NAME: 厨师
DESCRIPTIONS: 每回合开始，获得一张随机食物牌
